name: PANCHI
description:
A fast paced action game about kicking and panching your way to victory!

This is a demo so many things are not implemented yet, like the audio menu. Many things are present though and the demo is fully playable, it is also possible to play TWO PLAYERS ON THE SAME KEYBOARD! :D

There is currently only one gamemode, a PvP mode where each player tries to knock the others off the map. In the full release there will be several gamemodes, including a singleplayer gamemode with bosses!

Any feedback please post it here or in the discord!

Join discord discord.gg/rWQCEYH for direct chat !
